Class RolesUtil

java.lang.Object
utils.permissions.RolesUtil
public class RolesUtil extends Object
This utility class provides methods for managing user roles represented as bitwise integers. Includes functionalities for role conversion, role checking, addition, and removal.
Author:
Dhruv

  • Method Details

    • intToRoles

      public static Roles[] intToRoles(int rolesInt)
      Takes a decimal string representing the combined bitwise permissions and converts it to an array/list of Roles. Example: "3" => binary 0b11 => USER and ADMIN bits are set.
      Parameters:
      rolesInt - decimal string representing bitwise roles
      Returns:
      an array of Roles that are set in the given string

    • rolesToInt

      public static int rolesToInt(Roles[] roles)
      Takes an array of Roles and converts them to a decimal string representing the combined bitwise roles.
      Parameters:
      roles - array of Roles
      Returns:
      decimal string of the combined bit value

    • hasRole

      public static boolean hasRole(Roles[] roles, Roles requiredRole)
      Checks if the given Roles array contains the specified role.
      Parameters:
      roles - array of Roles user has
      requiredRole - role to check for

    • hasRole

      public static boolean hasRole(Roles role, Roles requiredRole)
      Checks if the provided role is the required role.
      Parameters:
      role - user's role
      requiredRole - role to check for

    • hasRole

      public static boolean hasRole(int rolesInt, Roles requiredRole)
      Checks if the provided roles integer contains the specified role.
      Parameters:
      rolesInt - integer representing the combined bitwise roles.
      requiredRole - role to check for.

      roles - array of Roles user has
      requiredRoles - array of Roles to check for

      public static boolean hasAnyRole(Roles[] roles, Roles[] requiredRoles)

      requiredRoles - array of Roles to check for

      public static int addRole(int rolesInt, Roles role)
      Add a role to a given integer representing the combined bitwise roles.
      Parameters:

      role - role to add
      Returns:
      integer with the added role

    • removeRole

      public static int removeRole(int rolesInt, Roles role)
      Remove a role from a given integer representing the combined bitwise roles.
      Parameters:
      rolesInt - integer representing the combined bitwise roles
      role - role to remove
      Returns:
      integer with the removed role
